Reviews.Title: “If you want the best, go for Pan Pacific Serviced Suites”
Reviews.Author: Velter
Reviews.Content: am travelling singapore business approximately 6 times planning stay 7 nights definately consider pan pacific serviced suites looking 5 star accomodation tried twice stays excellent hotel quality singapore compared cities plenty options beats suites contemporary designed convenient leisure business immidiately class materials truly speed internet tv programmes features wouldnt standard business hotels kitchen washing machinedryer etc dont consider paying extra water coffeebreakfast papers etc available free appartment tired endless identical business probably service staff reception somehow name welcome visit months ago yes service speaking singapore hotels feel perfect blend hospitality privacy travellers location perfect orchard road steps taxi lane somerset mrt personally dont fancy orchard road shopping hell soon step indoor completely private quiet stay am trying negative cant definately

Reviews.Title: “NON-SMOKERS BEWARE!!!!!!!!! It is vile.”

Reviews.Content: property nonsmoking nonsmoking floors surprisingly advertised prepurchase advertising indeed told repeated trouble length stay cigarette smoke entering door air conditioning person smoking door lovely smoke own sending smoke ours management pathetic sea simplest request move eventually tiring incompetence forfeited prepaid accommodation stay property strongly recommend staying location orchard road poor service alternatives stones throw

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC SERVICE & BRILLIANT LOCATION”

Reviews.Content: wife 10 month son stayed holiday 1 week leading singapore grand prix fantastic stay moment taxi pulled moment left staff reception cleaning lady breakfast waitress feel home provide exceptional service 2 bedroom apartment roomy modern 11th floor shared living read books provided play wee coffee machine provided location brilliant orchard rd brand shopping center provided staythe minimun 7 night stay hotel dont bars service ect finger tips soon step door looking hotel alternative highly recomend pan pacific suites
